name: Wii Backup File System File
summary: A WBF1 file is the second part of a Wii game disk image created using Wiimms WBFS Tool, Wii Backup Manager, or another Nintendo Wii-related program. It contains a portion of a game that was too large to fit into a single .WBFS file. A WBF1 file must be paired with its corresponding WBFS file to be played on the Nintendo Wii or a Wii emulator.
